def check_if_last_char_is_a_letter(txt):
    '''

    check_if_last_char_is_a_letter("") ➞ False 
    '''
    # Write your code here
    if txt == '':
        return False
    else:
        return txt[-1].isalpha() and txt[-1] not in txt[:-1].split()
